Text: Follow UpMark Thanks again for our impromptu meeting from last week Upon review of my notes I realized that I had promised you a bit more info on Beachfire to facilitate your offer to introduce us around to some of your collea gues Heres the general overview and the attached presentation gives a littl e more flavor for our company and the software Most business transactions are governed by written agreements and most agreements require some level of negotiation As the total number of peopl e working on both sides of a deal increases multiple cycles of comments and revisions to the contract cause significant difficulty and delay Beachfir e s software enables companies to reduce by up to the time effort and aggravation associated with executing most business agreements All parties to a deal regardless of their location can use Beachfires software to simultaneously or asynchronously work on the same document vi a the Internet Whoever is driving the deal creates the initial draf t and designates who is allowed to comment on edit and approve the agreement Beachfires software eliminates the problems and delays that occur when multiple copies of a document are distributed to a group Since the softwa re is based on negotiation best practices it actually increases the probability of a successful deal Anyone with Internet access can quickly begin using Beachfires software There is no effort or expense required by IT staff to install or manage the software In addition the Beachfire solution is far more secure than collaboration via email This is a very brief description of a powerful collaboration tool I woul d be happy to set up additional demonstrations of our software for anyone who is interested in learning more Best regards Michael Michael Hayes Vice President Sales Beachfire Collaborative Negotiation Solutions Beachfire Introductionpps

RE Follow Upare my favorite reason for people not calling me back Hope you have a great time and that your cell phone never rings Talk to you at the end of May Michael Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday May PM To Michael eachfirecom Subject Re Follow Up Sorry I havent been able to respond I have been swamped trying to get away for a vacation and in fact am leaving in the morning I will have to get back to you when I return which will not be until the nd

RE Follow UpHello Mark Yes its that guy from Boston again This is my every couple weeks circle back with Enron to see if Mark has had a chance to contact the other groups he thinks might be interested in online contract negotiation message Michael PS Did you see the quote from the California Asst AG who wants to personally escort your Chairman to jail I wonder what office hes running for Original Message From Michael Hayes Sent Friday May AM To Subject RE Follow Up Vacations are my favorite reason for people not calling me back Hope you have a great time and that your cell phone never rings Talk to you at the end of May Michael Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday May PM To Michael eachfirecom Subject Re Follow Up Sorry I havent been able to respond I have been swamped trying to get away for a vacation and in fact am leaving in the morning I will have to get back to you when I return which will not be until the nd

ISDA and BeachfireHello Mark Hope things are well at Enron Weve been busy since you and I met in April Im attaching a press release that you may find of interest If you do please dont hesitate to contact me Best regards Michael Michael Hayes Vice President Sales Beachfire Collaborative Negotiation Solutions
